descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/RiverwoodBanner_zpse24906af.jpg[/IMG]

Once I find this loveless villages terrible in Skyrim, I built my own first Riverwood. Maybe I'll do another,
but this takes a lot of time and desire. 
This mod I built for ME, so I also do not respond to negative criticism. 
If someone thinks that something I have on the eyes, then anticipate NO. Everything that is wrong should be wrong. 
If something is on the floor, or wrong, and not in the middle, then heard the for me that way. I do not like clutter and drawn with a ruler level. Due to the exact place that works for me and the level artificially missing life.
If someone has the same opinion, then he can download the piece here.

[font="Arial"] [b] [color=lightgreen] [size=2]made by  izon87604[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]
[youtube]314s7vgrTX0[/youtube]

[font="Impact"] [b] [color=lightgreen] [size=5]NEWS[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]
01.11.2013
[font="Arial"] [b] [color=green] [size=2]Fixed NavMesh bug[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]

30.10.2013

v.1.0 Final [font="Arial"] [b] [color=green] [size=2]Added a Arrows seller and a few things. Interior finished. Finally Sleeping Inn has a toilet at the back of the house.(lol)[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]

[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/10187487196_22f62e3ef6_c_zps443b47ac.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/1018762e3ef6_c_zps1b193fcd.jpg[/IMG]

There was NOTHING changed from the game (marker, quests, NPCs, etc.)
There is NO Scripts

[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/10187487192f62e3ef6_c_zps8503dc81.jpg[/IMG]

[font="Impact"] [b] [color=green] [size=5]REQUIREMENTS:[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]
NOTHING !!

[font="Impact"] [b] [color=green] [size=5]STRONGLY recommended:[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]
[font="Arial"] [color=lightgreen]Skyrim Flora Overhaul Basic V.186 performance + (use a green Shrub texture from an older version made by EWI)[/color] [/font]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141/?
[font="Arial"] [color=lightgreen]Natura Grass Texture Floor[/color] [/font]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30164/?
[font="Arial"] [color=lightgreen]Ewis Alternative Rock Textures[/color] [/font]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27926/?
[font="Arial"] [color=lightgreen]HD Ivy - Original Green[/color] [/font]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30971/?

Visual changes were made ONLY, NO new features, Meshes or something
New NPC's with sandbox
New Merchants (Fletcher, Alchemy and Blacksmith)

[IMG]http://i829.photobucket.com/albums/zz213/ChevinResearch/10187ef6_c_zps7568cbaa.jpg[/IMG]

[font="Impact"] [b] [color=green] [size=5]FPS:[/color] [/b] [/font] [/size]
30-40 fps in Riverwood
my Rig:
Intel ® Core ™ i7-950 Quad Core
Corsair DIMM 12 GB DDR3-1600 Tri
Gainward GeForce GTX 570 Ti Phantom with 1.2GB of VRam

[font="Arial"] [color=green] [size=3]mods used at Screens:[/color] [/font] [/size]

Climates of Tamriel by jjc71
EnhancedLightsandFX by anamorfus
CoT patch FogEdition by prod80
Supreme Storms CoT Version by mannygt
COT - Weather Patch - Snow by Saerileth
Pure Waters by Laast
Dust Effects by HHaleyy
Expanded Snow Systems - COT Version by JonusL2D
Skyrim Flora Overhaul by vurt
Ivy HD - Original Green by joshezzell
HiRes Stumps by SPARTAN VI
Real Rain by PlayerTw0
Splash of Rain by isoku
Advanced potions retexture by newmiller
High Quality Food and Ingredients by Iraito
Realistic Smoke and Embers by isoku
